Stacy Montemayor

Data Wrangling + Visualizations for Storytelling

Mission-driven and relentlessly curious, I am seeking opportunities in data journalism.


Data Projects


Seattle Police Department:
Sexual Assault and Violent Crime Calls

An exploration of violent crime calls and sexual assault calls in Seattle, Washington from 2010 to 2018.
Tools: Python, Pandas, Jupyter Notebook, matplotlib, NumPy, Tableau.



OpenElections Open Source Project

Data entry and converting PDF data into CSVs.
Tools: Tabula, Excel, LibreOffice and my fingers.



Web Development Projects


Portfolio

This static portfolio website. Take a look around.
Tools: Jekyll, HTML, JavaScript, SASS.



Votes From Abroad

Informational website guiding US citizens living overseas on the process to register and vote from abroad.
Tools: HTML, CSS.



Teacup Woozy Travel Planning

A static website for a small travel planning business.
Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript.



Writing Projects


Hale Makua Health Services

Researched and wrote 150+ page Emergency Operations Manual and Communications Plan for a non-profit long-term care facility for frail elderly. Written in compliance with new Federal regulations regarding emergency events.


Teacup Woozy Travel Planning

Weekly travel-related blog posts and twice-monthly newsletters.


Untitled Novel

A few years back I made a goal to write a novel. Over the course of the next few months ‚Äì because I am very motivated by goals ‚Äì I did just that. And now, I am the proud creator of an incredibly mediocre 65,000-word novel.


The Orion

Entertainment editor and columnist for California State University, Chico student newspaper. Awards during my tenure: Pacemaker Award for General Excellence and Society of Professional Journalists (Regional) first place award for Best All-Around University Newspaper.


The Synthesis Weekly

While in college, I was a staff writer, fine arts columnist, feature writer, then managing editor of a very rough-around-the-edges entertainment weekly. Fortunately, I had an incredible copyeditor.
